title.narrative: Caucasus Green Economy Financing Facility (GEFF) – SREP Armenia Renewable Energy Grant Support

description.narrative: These loans shall be dedicated to finance private sector sub-borrowers (including buildings) in Armenia for investment in renewable energy heat technologies (RES-H) and services supporting the EBRD’s Green Economy Transition and the objectives of the SREP.

participating-org.narrative: European Bank for Reconstruction and Development

activity-date.narrative: Planned start date of the activity

mailing-address.narrative: The World Bank, 1818 H Street, NW, Washington, DC 20433 USA
